text: Hi, do you already have a working count-down module?

Hi all. I encountered a weird behavior yesterday when working with multiple themes. Within these themes are some custom modules that share the same name, e.g. list-block. Now, this started as 1 theme, which I then duplicated, and when I started updating the stylesheets for the new theme, the modules continued to use the stylesheet for that custom_module from the initial theme, not the stylesheet relevant to that module from its actual theme. Has anyone encountered something like this before? Cheers
Thanks for the response! I'm still trying to see if I can do it with a workflow instead of javascript

Is there a way to unload a module via javascript? I have a module that we have on a tabbed div, but the module doesn't like to have two versions of it self, so i'd like ot unload and reload the module on tab switch.
